Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, positioned directly below the button with a top outer spacing of 5px, has fill color #ffffff, a 1px solid outline #cccccc, border radius 4px, maximum vertical extent of 200px, enables scroll when content exceeds this height, and has a smooth change on opacity lasting 200ms
Verify the 'English' option is selected with fill color #e9ecef and type weight 600
Scroll down the page until the 'Back to Top' button becomes visible

Verify its position is fixed at bottom 20px, right 20px, fill color is #007bff, text color is #ffffff, has a border radius of 50% for a circular shape, horizontal extent 48px, vertical extent 48px, and accessibility label is 'Scroll to top of page'
Click the 'Back to Top' button
Verify the page scrolls to scroll-top 0px within 300ms
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar element is visible, has fill color #e0e0e0, horizontal extent is 100% of its container, vertical extent is 8px, border radius 4px, and no outline
Verify its fill segment has a fill color of #28a745
Verify the 'value' attribute of the progress bar updates from 0% to 100% during the upload
Verify a text label displays 'Uploading file...' with text size 14px, aligned right, and its opacity changes from 0 to 1 with a motion effect lasting 1s
Open the date picker widget
Verify the selected date is '2023-10-26'
Verify the 'Today' button is enabled, has fill color #007bff, and text color #ffffff
Verify the 'Next Month' button is visible, has an accessibility label 'Next month', horizontal extent 36px, and vertical extent 36px
Verify the currently displayed month and year 'October 2023' has a type weight 700
Verify the date picker itself has a 1px solid outline in color #cccccc
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible, positioned 5px below the icon with an arrow shape pointing upwards, has fill color #333333, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, text 'Need assistance? Click here for support.' with text size 13px, inner spacing of 8px, and fades in with a smooth change on opacity over 150ms
Interact with the product image carousel
Verify the current image source is 'product_image_1.jpg' and its intrinsic size are 1000x800px
Verify there are exactly 3 navigation dots (count is 3) below the image, centered horizontally
Verify each navigation dot has a border radius of 50% for a circular shape
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is enabled, its horizontal extent is 40px, vertical extent is 40px, and its fill color is rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Click the 'Next' arrow button
Verify clicking 'Next' animates the image slide smooth change over 400ms
Verify each tab has inner spacing of 12px horizontally and 8px vertically
Verify the inactive tab has a fill color #f0fef0
Click the 'Specifications' tab
Verify this tab becomes active, its fill color changes to #ffffff, and its outline-bottom color changes to #007bff
Verify the corresponding content panel becomes visible, positioned with a top outer spacing of 10px
Verify the 'Description' tab is no longer active, its text color is #6c757d, and type weight is 400
Verify the active tab's label 'Specifications' has text size 16px and type weight 700
Examine the breadcrumbs navigation
Verify the entire breadcrumb container is visible, has bottom outer spacing of 20px, inner spacing of 10px, fill color #f8f9fa, and all items are aligned left
Verify the 'Home' link text is 'Home', has text size 14px, and color #007bff
Verify the separator element '/' has color #6c757d
Verify the 'Current Product' text 'Product Name' is not a link, has type weight 600, and color #343a40
Verify the last item has no right outer spacing
Inspect the user profile avatar
Verify the avatar image source is 'user_avatar.png', its display size are 50x50px, has a circular shape with border radius 50%, and is loaded within 200ms

Verify the 'Online' status badge is visible, positioned at bottom 0px, right 0px relative to the avatar, has fill color #28a745, horizontal extent 12px, vertical extent 12px, and has a 1px solid white outline
View the interactive map widget
Verify the map is visible, its horizontal extent is 600px, vertical extent is 400px, and has a 2px solid outline in color #aaaaaa
Verify exactly 3 markers (count is 3) are displayed on the map, each with an alternative text 'Location marker'
Verify the zoom controls are enabled, visible, and aligned right
Verify the map copyright label '© OpenStreetMap contributors' is displayed at the bottom left with text size 10px and color #6c757d
